name: Cavernous Dark
description:
STORY: You as the player take the role of a miner who is the only survivor of an unfortunate cave-in that caused them to fall into a massive cavern below. In this new cavern, the only thing you have for light is your battery-powered flashlight. From there, you'll have to find a way out, using the light of the flashlight to help navigate, look for more batteries, and avoid the dangers hidden in the cavern.

NOTE: If I were you, I'd use your flashlight sparingly~
